description: A collection of XML import maps.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

parameters.description: The tag to map. Can accept: XMLTag or String.
parameters.name: markupTag

parameters.description: the mapped style. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, CharacterStyle, TableStyle, CellStyle or String.
parameters.name: mappedStyle

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new XMLImportMap (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the XMLImportMap.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the XMLImportMap with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the XMLImportMaps within the specified range.

parameters.description: The XMLImportMap, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLImportMap, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The XMLImportMap, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLImportMap, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first XMLImportMap in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last XMLImportMap in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle XMLImportMap in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the XMLImportMap with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the XMLImportMap that follows the desired XMLImportMap.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the XMLImportMap whose index follows the specified XMLImportMap in the collection.

parameters.description: The XMLImportMap whose index comes before the desired XMLImportMap.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any XMLImportMap in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every XMLImportMap in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLImportMap.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the XMLImportMap with the specified index.

name: XMLImportMaps
